name: Thögn Anti-Air Rifle
on_hit: The target is Slowed until the end of their next turn. In addition, if the target is flying, they immediately land (this counts as falling without any damage), and can’t fly until the end of their next turn.

name: Temporal Masquerade Shield
effect: Gain the Future Sight reaction. If the Temporal Masquerade Shield is thrown, the Future Sight reaction cannot be used until it is retrieved.

actions.name: Future Sight
actions.trigger: An enemy attacks an allied character within a Range equal to your Speed.
actions.detail: You may move a number of spaces up to your Speed towards your target, by the most direct route possible. If you would reach the allied character’s space, you take their place, becoming the target of the attack and suffering all of its damage and effects, and the allied character is pushed one space in any direction.

name: Geirskogul
effect: You may attack with this weapon without expending or requiring charges. Instead, you may expend a charge to use the Hope Will Never Die full action.

actions.name: Hope Will Never Die
actions.detail: Bolster all allied characters within a Burst equal to your Speed.

name: Parallel Falchion
effect: You begin any fight in either the Sol or Luna profile, and may change to either the Sol or Luna profile as a protocol. Once you have selected a profile, you remain in it until you take a new profile.

profiles.name: Sol
profiles.effect: On hit, gain Overshield equal to the amount of damage dealt to the target.

profiles.name: Aether
profiles.effect: On hit, gain Overshield equal to the amount of damage dealt to the target.

name: Life’s Gauntlet
description: Many do not journey beyond the Gate of Life. Its gauntlet is more than enough for even the most robust of souls. Those that do have eyes open to possibility, and rush headlong into the future.
effect: When you attack with this weapon, you may deal damage and trigger other effects (including talents and systems) as though it were an improvised attack. If you do, take 1 Heat.

name: Scrap Sprayer
on_attack: Pummels the ground with hazardous shards in the attack area, creating Difficult Terrain until the end of the scene. Characters in the area also receive +1 Difficulty to Agility checks and saves.
effect: Can be fired as Cone 5 or Line 10.

name: “Harvester” Disassembly Arms
on_hit:
Begin dismantling your target. Roll 1d6 to determine a side effect from the table below.
  1. Compromise Frame: They are Impaired until the end of their next turn.
  2. Uncover a Weakness: They are Shredded until the end of their next turn and receive Lock On.
  3. Demolish: They take 2 AP Kinetic damage, 2 AP Energy damage, and 2 Heat instead of this weapon’s normal damage.
  4. Dismantle motor controls: They are knocked Prone.
  5. Dismantle system controls: They cannot take or benefit from tech actions until the end of their next turn.
  6. Dismantle weapon controls: They cannot make attacks, other than Improvised Attack, Grapple, and Ram until the end of their next turn.
on_crit: Roll 2d6 instead. If you get the same number on both dice, roll another 1d6 until you get a different number.

profiles.name: Standard
profiles.effect: As a Quick Action, you may focus your fire with this weapon. Gain the Precision Fire profile until the start of your next turn.

actions.name: Focus Fire
actions.detail: Focus your fire, targeting enemy weaknesses at the cost of the weapon’s overall power. Switch to this weapon's "Precision Fire" profile until the start of your next turn.

profiles.name: Precision Fire
profiles.on_hit: The target is Shredded and Impaired until the end of their next turn.
profiles.effect: At the start of your next turn, switch to the Standard profile.

name: Bremsstrahlung Emitter
on_hit: The target is Slowed until the end of their next turn.

actions.name: Sweep for Anomalies
actions.detail: Choose either yourself or an ally within this weapon’s Range. The target clears Impaired and Lock On.

name: Piezoelectric Igniter
on_hit: If the target has already marked Burn, increase it by 2.

name: Powerhead Spear
effect: You may attack with this weapon without expending charges.
on_hit: You may expend a charge. If you do, the target takes bonus AP Explosive damage equal to their marked Burn, then may roll an Engineering check to clear their Burn.

name: Mooring Hook Cannon
on_hit: If the target fails an Agility save, it is immediately pulled adjacent to you, or as close as possible, by the most direct path.
